files.description: Documents the purpose of the /outputs directory, what artifacts are generated, and how to validate their presence in the repository.
Provides the first concrete roadmap artifact outlining mission goals, deliverables, and next steps for the pipeline in a versioned format.

missionDescription: Create the first concrete files under /outputs/ (at minimum: /outputs/README.md + one core artifact like /outputs/roadmap_v1.md) and verify they exist in the repo filesystem so the deliverables audit is no longer zero.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Identifies the root blocker: the program is generating plans but producing no persistent artifacts, which prevents Definition-of-Done from being met and directly explains why the BLOCKED TASK (goal_5)...
projectName: the first concrete files under /outputs/ (at minimum: /outputs/README.md + one core artifact like /outputs/roadmap_v1.md) and verify they exist in the repo filesystem so the deliverables audit is no longer zero.
